protein.specific_function: Exhibits arylsulfatase activity and highly specific endoglucosamine-6-sulfatase activity. It can remove sulfate from the C-6 position of glucosamine within specific subregions of intact heparin

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Morimoto-Tomita M, Uchimura K, Werb Z, Hemmerich S, Rosen SD: Cloning and characterization of two extracellular heparin-degrading endosulfatases in mice and humans. J Biol Chem. 2002 Dec 20;277(51):49175-85. Epub 2002 Oct 3.
